32 template<typename T>
33 bitpit::IBinaryStream& operator>>(bitpit::IBinaryStream &stream, T &value)
34 {
35  stream.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&value), sizeof(T));
36 
37  return stream;
38 }
39 
50 template<typename T>
51 bitpit::IBinaryStream& operator>>(bitpit::IBinaryStream &stream, std::vector<T> &vector)
52 {
53  std::size_t size;
54  stream.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&size), sizeof(size));
55  vector.resize(size);
56 
57  stream.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(vector.data()), size * sizeof(T));
58 
59  return stream;
60 }
61 
69 template<typename T>
70 bitpit::OBinaryStream& operator<<(bitpit::OBinaryStream &stream, const T &value)
71 {
72  stream.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&value), sizeof(T));
73 
74  return stream;
75 }
76 
86 template<typename T>
87 bitpit::OBinaryStream& operator<<(bitpit::OBinaryStream &stream, const std::vector<T> &vector)
88 {
89  std::size_t size = vector.size();
90  stream.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&size), sizeof(size));
91 
92  stream.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(vector.data()), size * sizeof(T));
93 
94  return stream;
95 }
